titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: INTENDED CLINICAL CARE INTENSITY CODE (MENTAL HEALTH) - Permitted National Codes

stentry.p: Mental Illness intensive care: specially designated ward for PATIENTS needing containment and more intensive management (e.g. Psychiatric Intensive Care Unit (PICU)). This is not to be confused with intensive nursing where PATIENTS may require one to one nursing while on a standard WARD
Mental Illness short stay: PATIENTS intended to stay less than a year
Mental Illness long stay: PATIENTS intended to stay a year or more
Learning_DisabilityPATIENTS in a designated or interim secure unit
Learning_DisabilityPATIENTS intending to stay less than a year
Learning_Disability PATIENTS intending to stay a year or more
